title: Linux date Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux date command and learn how to display, format, and manipulate date and time information on your system.

meta.title: Linux date Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux date command and learn how to display, format, and manipulate date and time information on your system.
meta.keywords: Linux, date command, time, format, system management, system monitoring

verify.name: Verify date command syntax
verify.hint: The output of the `date --help` command should include the basic syntax for the `date` command, which is `date [OPTION]... [+FORMAT]`.

verify.name: Verify date command output
verify.hint: The output of the `date` command should match the current date and time in the default format.

verify.name: Verify date command formatting
verify.hint: The output of the `date` command with the specified formatting should match the current date and time.
